about_the_game:
The God of B-movies uses his divine power to send you to another world to shoot battle scenes for him. Can you bring back a thrilling battle video? Looking forward to your performance!
Game QQ group: 778398135

Game Features

-More than 80 types of cards for you to combine and enhance your combat power!
-Eliminate energy blocks to trigger cards, adding fun and strategy!
-Multiple skills to match, no cost for skill upgrades!
-Similar to the gameplay of flying chess, you can only leave the battle area if you roll a specific number on the dice!
-Progress on the map triggers various events, large areas encounter battles, small areas random events (shops, rest places, skill upgrades, lucky draws)
-Dozens of consumables and equipment for you to choose!
-Endless challenges, the more rounds the player makes, the stronger the enemy!

short_description: This is a light ROGUE game that triggers card battles by eliminating batteries. Players will use dice to randomly advance on a circular map full of various events. In addition, there are multiple elements such as skills and props. Try to train yourself to defeat powerful enemies.
